summary: Tested Submissions page restructure from split-panel layout to full-width table with slide-over modal. All 10 test cases passed. Key changes verified: 1) Full-width table layout (no inline form on left), 2) '+ New Submission' button in header opens slide-over modal, 3) Modal contains all form fields, 4) Form submission works correctly with success toast and modal close, 5) Cancel button discards form and closes modal, 6) Detail slide-over still works when clicking table rows, 7) RELEASE DATE and CREATED columns visible, 8) Priority column uses Badge styling with colors.
passed_tests: Navigate to /dashboard/submissions → full-width table visible, no inline form on the left
Click '+ New Submission' button → slide-over modal appears from right
Modal contains all form fields: Source URL, Title, Guest, Description, Content Type, Priority, Release Date, Confirm checkbox
Fill form and submit → modal closes, success toast shown, new row appears in table
Click Cancel → modal closes, form state discarded, table unchanged
Form state resets after Cancel (fields empty when reopening)
Click any existing table row → existing detail slide-over opens correctly
RELEASE DATE column is visible in the table with formatted dates
CREATED column is visible in the table with formatted dates
Priority column shows Badge style with colors (High=red, Medium=amber)

priorityCfg object provides correct color styling for High/Medium/Low badges
formatDate function handles null/undefined dates gracefully with '—' fallback
